dmca.title: [ABUSE] copywritten material and illegal content hosted by www.cg-corporation.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Peter [mailto:peter98@internode.on.net] 
Sent: Thursday, January 05, 2006 7:41 PM
To: Legal Response
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: FW: [ABUSE] copywritten material and illegal content hosted by
www.cg-corporation.com


Please Do not pass on any personal Details to any other parties in this
matter.

 

Service Provider(s)

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries

 

Name of Agent Designated to Receive Notification of Claimed Infringement

George Poletes, Corporate Counsel

 

Full Address of Designated Agent to Which Notification Should be Sent

1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, Dallas, TX 75207

 

Telephone Number of Designated Agent

(214) 782-7800

 

Facsimile Number of Designated Agent

(214) 782-7756

 

E-Mail Address of Designated Agent

copyright@theplanet.com

 

This photo has been distributed ,
http://www.cg-corporation.com/bored/quiet%5e.jpg
<http://www.cg-corporation.com/bored/quiet^.jpg> , via this web site. There
has been
no permission from me to host or distrubute this photograph.

I would like this picture removed from your servers.

The information to my belief in this email is correct and true.
